pieces.title: The Planets by Gustav Holst
pieces.description: Explore the universe through Holst's orchestral suite, capturing the astrological character of each planet in our solar system.

pieces.title: The Rite of Spring by Igor Stravinsky
pieces.description: Delve into the controversial 1913 premiere that sparked riots and reshaped modern music and ballet forever.

pieces.title: Symphony No. 9 'Choral' by Ludwig van Beethoven
pieces.description: Discover the revolutionary symphony whose final movement's 'Ode to Joy' became a universal anthem for humanity.

pieces.title: Turangalîla-Symphonie by Olivier Messiaen
pieces.description: Experience Messiaen's vibrant and ecstatic exploration of love, joy, and exotic soundscapes inspired by mythology and spirituality.

pieces.title: Appalachian Spring by Aaron Copland
pieces.description: Journey into the heart of American optimism and pioneering spirit depicted vividly through Copland's ballet music.

pieces.title: Symphonie Fantastique by Hector Berlioz
pieces.description: Immerse yourself in a groundbreaking narrative symphony portraying obsessive love, dreams, and dramatic visions.

pieces.title: La Mer by Claude Debussy
pieces.description: Sail away on an impressionistic musical voyage capturing the mysterious beauty and changing moods of the ocean.

pieces.title: Music for 18 Musicians by Steve Reich
pieces.description: Dive into Reich's hypnotic, rhythmic masterpiece that explores human perception, repetition, and minimalist patterns.

pieces.title: 1812 Overture by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky
pieces.description: Witness history in music as Tchaikovsky vividly commemorates Russia's victory over Napoleon's invading army.

pieces.title: The Four Seasons by Antonio Vivaldi
pieces.description: Travel through the seasons with this iconic violin concerto series, painting a vivid picture of nature's ever-changing beauty.

pieces.title: Carmina Burana by Carl Orff
pieces.description: Step into the medieval world of poetry, fate, and fortune brought to life through Orff's powerful choral and orchestral setting.

pieces.title: Pictures at an Exhibition by Modest Mussorgsky
pieces.description: Stroll through Mussorgsky's vivid musical gallery inspired by paintings, capturing the spirit and imagery of Russian art.

pieces.title: Boléro by Maurice Ravel
pieces.description: Experience the hypnotic build-up of this iconic piece that reflects the captivating and mesmerizing rhythm of dance and movement.

pieces.title: Peer Gynt Suite by Edvard Grieg
pieces.description: Embark on a journey through Norwegian folklore with Grieg's dramatic and picturesque musical storytelling.
